name: High Lumen Super Bright Bike Lights,5200mAh Runtime 10+ Hours,Rechargeable Bicycle Lights Front and Back for Night Riding,5 Light Modes,Easy to Install Without Tools
short_description: 【Super Bright+Long Endurance】Swittn bike lights are equipped with 3 T6 LED lamp beads,very bright to meet your night riding needs. Also built-in high capacity rechargeable battery, the headlight run time 4 to 10+ hours, the taillight run time 50 hours.

【Switchable Light Mode】3 light mode:high/low/strobe,5 light mode:high/mid/low/strobe/SOS. Holding dowm for 3 seconds to switch between 3 and 5 mode when it is off. Can be adjusted freely according to your preferences.

【Waterproof+Grade Military】: The IPX5 waterproof bike lights can be used in rainy or snowy weather,Swittn bike light is made of high quality aluminum alloy, which has excellent impact resistance, heat dissipation and corrosion resistance.

【Multiple Functions】Swittn bicycle light has multiple functions,Suitable for cycling, fishing, running, dog walking, camping or other activities and can be used as emergency flashlight. Also has the function of power bank,you can charge your phone in case of emergency.

【Satisfactory After-Sales Support】Swittn provides customers with high quality bicycle light sets and excellent customer service. If there is any problem with the product, please feel free to contact us,we will arrange a free replacement or a refund for you. Please rest assured to purchase.

name: NiteRider Swift 300 Front Bike Light Sabre 110 Rear Bike Light Combo Pack- USB Rechargeable Bicycle Headlight LED Front Light Easy to Install Water Resistant Road Commuting Cycling Safety Flashlight
short_description: LOCK MODE FEATURE keeps the Swift 300 headlight securely powered off during transport or storage. Unlock / Lock the light by simply holding the power button down for 8-10 seconds.
IMPORTANT to note that NiteRider uses this key feature after assembly and production to prepare for transport. The light is set to Lock Mode at the factory, unlock before use.

OPTIMAL VIZ for increased visibility while out on the roadways. Cars and motorcycles are incorporating daytime running lights for increased daylight visibility. And with drivers more distracted than ever, we think cyclists should as well

SWIFT 300 COLLIMATOR LENS WITH SIDE LIGHTING increases your visibility while out on the roadways. The custom lens projects a smooth and wide beam pattern to light your path along busy city streets and dimly lit bike paths.
SWIFT FEATURES A SMOOTH 300 LUMEN beam pattern in an ultra compact and lightweight design

name: G Keni Smart Brake Sensing Rear Bike Lights, Auto Light Sensing Bike Tail Light, IPX6 Waterproof, Ultra Bright LED Taillights, Rechargeable Safety Road Back Bicycle Lights for Night Riding
short_description: [ Smart Brake Sensing Bike Tail Lights ] - This smart rear bike light can automatically switch to high light mode when it braking, ultra-bright for 5 secs lights warning back rider to enhance your safety. You can mount it under the saddle with metal mounting bracket or mount to the seat post with adjustable silicone strap.

[ Four Modes High Lumen LED Rear Bicycle Light ] - The Rear bicycle light have 4 light modes for your choice, (1)Normal Flash Mode, (2)Breathing Flash Mode, (3)Fast Flash Mode, (4)Steady On Mode, enjoy your cycling as you wish, High lumen COB Led bike taillight makes you more visible, it's a perfect bike light for night riding.

[ Light Sensing Auto ON/OFF for Battery Saving ] - Our Smart bike tail light including Motion Sensor and Light Sensor, it will be auto off when detect in no motion after 30 secs. Once touch it or detect the bike is moving, the light will auto on again. Also when you ride under the sunlight, the tailight will be auto off due to the light sensor is working, IF YOU LIKE TO RIDE IN THE DAYTIME AND NEED THE TAILLIGHT KEEP WORKING ALL THE TIME, please choose the mode 3 and mode 4

[ Brightness Adjustable Bike Back Light ] - The brightness of this bike rear light is adjustable, Max to 120 Lumen,1000m Viewable, in the steady on mode, just long press the button to adjust the brightness that you need, it Built-in 400mAh Li-ion battery, it can lasting 50 hours (will be influenced by the brightness that you setting) runing time when fully charged. four blue indicator lights, each shows 25% capacity, No longer worry about forget to charge.

[ Aluminum Alloy Shell & IPX6 Waterpoof ] - Made of aluminum alloy shell, this bike rear light has a nice touch and awesome appearance. It's waterproof/dustproof and shockproof, suitable for any harsh working environment. we guarantee a 12-month warranty, 30-day money back and 24/7 customer service to make it no risk for you to purchase this taillight.

name: USB Rechargeable Bike Light Set, LED Front Headlight & Rear Tail Light, Waterproof Bicycle Light, 4 Modes, Silicone & Plastic, Bright LED, Outdoor Bike Lighting, Rechargeable Bicycle Light Set
short_description: Multifunctional Bike Light Set: This USB rechargeable bike light set features bright front and rear LEDs, offering superior visibility for cycling safety in any condition—perfect for both day and night rides. (Size: 1.97 x 1.38 x 1.77 inches)

Waterproof & Impact-Resistant: Built with durable silicone and plastic (Size: 1.97 x 1.38 x 1.77 inches), this bike light set is fully waterproof and designed to endure rain, mud, and rough trails, ensuring reliable performance.

Eco-Friendly USB Rechargeable: Charge conveniently via USB, eliminating the need for disposable batteries. Enjoy hours of bright, consistent light on a single charge—saving you money and protecting the environment..

Quick & Secure Installation: The flexible silicone mount ensures easy installation without tools. Simply attach the front and rear lights to your bike's handlebars, seat post, or frame for a secure fit. (Material: Silicone/Plastic)

Versatile LED Lantern: More than just a bike light, this set doubles as a powerful LED lantern, providing ample illumination for biking, camping, or emergency use—ensuring you’re never left in the dark. (Size: 1.97 x 1.38 x 1.77 inches)
product_description: USB Rechargeable Bike Light Set: Charge easily with USB for a bright LED front headlight and rear tail light (1.97 x 1.38 x 1.77), perfect for cycling day or night. Long-lasting, eco-friendly, and efficient.

name: Ultra Bright Rechargeable Bike Light Set Headlight with a Built-in taillight and seatpost Mounted taillight to Keep You Safe on Every Ride for Night Riding andTubular Handlebar.
short_description: ULTRA BRIGHT: Ultra clear lens, aluminized finished directional reflector, and 2 LED bike front light emits a max output of 1050LM. Compared to typical low beam 700LM halogen car lights. Taillight 30 Chip-on-Board (CoB) high LEDs deliver up to 100LM.

RUNTIME: The front bike light is powered with a 5.0V-3600mAh Rechargeable Battery and running time range 4-24 hours after full 3.5 hours charge with any USB-C. The rear and front visibility light is powered with a a 3.7V-500mAh Lithium-Ion Polymer Rechargeable Battery. The running time range is 1.5-6 hours after 2 hours charge with any Micro-USB.

NIGHTTIME MODES: Start with the light off, press one time each the switch button for the 5 nighttime modes: High Beam, Low Bean, Low and High Beam, Flashing and Built in rear light with a double click. Adjust bean angle with bracket. The 5 Tail Light modes improve visility by switching to Solid Red, Solid White, Fast Red Flash, 3 Red Flash pattern, and Red / White flash. White light patterns improve front light setup.
ALL WEATHER CONDITIONS The ultra bright flashlight is designed for on land outdoor sports, all weather conditions while rubber port cover is fully placed. Use not suitable underwater.
STRAIGHTFORWARD SET UP : On tubular handlebar 22.2mm or 31.8mm, mount bracket over right gasket facing front, tight manually, slide headlamp to the middle mark on slot, adjust angle, tight manually.
product_description: Introducing the UWILE Ultra Bright Bike Light Combo – Your Complete Lighting Solution for Safer Rides! This rechargeable bike light set includes a powerful headlight with a built-in taillight and a separate seatpost/frame-mounted taillight, providing 360° visibility to keep you safe on every ride—day or night. Designed for maximum brightness, durability, and versatility, this combo is the perfect companion for commuting, road cycling, or mountain biking. The headlight features multiple lighting modes, allowing you to easily adjust brightness and flash patterns to suit different riding conditions. Its integrated taillight adds an extra layer of rear visibility, ensuring you are seen from both directions. The adjustable bracket allows quick and secure mounting on tubular handlebars, compatible with a wide range of bikes, scooters, mini bikes, and e-bikes. The seatpost/frame taillight complements the front light by enhancing your visibility from behind. Both lights are waterproof and weather-resistant, so you can ride confidently in rain, fog, or any challenging environment without worrying about performance. With high-powered LED lights, this set ensures you’ll be visible to cyclists, pedestrians, and motorists alike. Whether you're commuting through the city or hitting the trails, this must-have combo offers enhanced safety and peace of mind. Its affordable price makes it an essential upgrade for every cyclist. So why wait? Add the UWILE Ultra Bright Bike Light Combo to your cart today and ride with confidence knowing you’re equipped with reliable, high-visibility lighting from every angle. Don’t let the dark stop you—stay safe, ride bright!

name: Bike Lights for Night Riding, 1200 Lumen Bicycle Front Headlight and Back Taillight with 4+5 Light Modes, USB Rechargeable Bright Bike Headlights for Cyclists and Commuters
short_description: Strong Brightness: 1200 lumens super brightness bike headlight and a brighter bike tail light provide a increased visibility and safety for night riding. IPX6 waterproof function allows you to ride with confidence even in rain or snow

Rechargeable/Long Battery Life: Our bike lights feature USB-C rechargeable, enabling your bike light set is always ready for your next ride. Fully recharge in less than 3 h when connected to any USB port. Runtime of up to 13 h on flashing mode for the headlight and up to 7 h on flowing mode for the taillight, perfect for extended outdoor adventures or night rides

4+5 Light Modes: The bike front light has four different modes. The bike rear light has five modes for added safety. Taillight memory function allows for hassle-free operation by automatically remembering the last used light mode. Note: Click three times taillight button to switch normal brightness modes to the warning modes

LCD Screen Display: The battery indicator and brightness indicator allow you to easily monitor the battery level and adjust the brightness according to your needs. Low battery indicator (Illuminate red when the battery is less than 20 percent)

Easy to Install: Easy mounting for bike handlebars and rear seat post without any tools. Also easy to remove with the nut or strap to loosen for using elsewhere leaving the mount behind. Several mounting options make it easy to suit your needs
